dict.acceptation: 注意；面向；寻找；看起来好像；
看；（尤指吸引人的）相貌；眼神；样子；

sent.orig: The magazine Look is no longer being published.
LOOK is a simple storage box.
sent.trans: LOOK是一个简单的环保贮物盒。

sent.orig: Look forward, look west, look to the heavens, look to god and make your choice.
sent.trans: 向前看，向西拓展，向天堂看，向上帝看，最终成就我们的选择。

sent.orig: It's look around you, look at the house, look at the streets, look at the city.
sent.trans: 现在，正如你所见的，看看你的周围，看看这些房屋、看看这些街道，再看看这整个城市。

sent.orig: Look forward, look west, look to the heavens, look to God and make your choice.
sent.trans: 朝前看，看向西方，看向天堂和上帝，做出选择吧。
